transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ma'am, good morning. Main Kusum baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, aapke relationship manager.
Customer: Good morning, ma'am.
Executive: Yes, actually mujhe ye jaanna tha ki aapko services use karne mein koi issue aa raha hai kya?
Customer: Haan?
Customer: No, ma'am.
Executive: Aapki company ke owner baar baar hamare paas complaint raise kar de rahe hain ki unko video meeting par discussion karna hai, discussion karna hai. Aapne bhi kal mere ko nahi bataya. Humko bas complaints hoti hai agar aap
Customer: Kya?
Customer: No, ma'am, abhi toh vaise koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar owner se baat kar lo. Owner ne bola ki aap ek baar employee ko dobara se ye samjha do ki application services kaise use karni hai. Maine bola jab unko koi dikkat hi nahi hai dobara kaise samjha do. Keh rahe nahi aap sikha do. Toh maine bola theek hai. Toh keh rahe hain ki finally main uske sir se puchta hu aur main aapko kal bata paunga. Madam ek baar aap unse khud se baat karke mujhe final bata do, aap discuss kar lo. Hamare paas complaint raise, ye close karna hota hai. Aap samjhiye ye point ko agar koi concern nahi hai toh.
Customer: Mere se, mere se baat kiye the, mere ko puchh liye toh maine toh bol diya tha ki mere ko koi dikkat nahi hai.
Executive: Haan. Unhone ye nahi pucha aap se dobara
Customer: No.
Executive: Unhone
Customer: Unhone ye bhi pucha aap se dobara aap unhone aap se ye nahi pucha ki dobara video call ki zarurat hai ya nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi toh unhone mere se pucha tha ki koi dikkat hai? Bole ki nahi, dikkat toh nahi hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kuch toh aisa hai nahi. Ki zarurat hogi toh maine toh number save kiya hi tha. Main call karungi.
Executive: Madam ek baar owner se puchh lo aap ki jo complaint raise hai waha pe close karwa de aur next time se koi concern hai woh direct mujhe call kar sakta hai. Aapke paas mera number hai. Unko bolo koi concern hoga main khud baat kar lungi. Baar baar agar aap complaints doge toh phir woh aapke liye bhi sahi nahi hai na, madam. Company pe baar baar complaints hoti hai toh.
Executive: Ek baar aap owner ko consciously call karke baat kar lo. Ticket close na karungi toh mail pe feedback jayega. Agar client ne waha pe no mark kar diya toh phir hamare liye ek aur complaint raise ho jayega. Jab koi concern nahi hai toh hum ye kar kyun rahe hain? Ek baar aap owner se puchh lo.
Customer: Nahi yaar toh abhi toh baat nahi ho paayi unse.
Executive: Toh ma'am main concern close karu ya nahi karu aap mujhe bata do. Aapki side se okay hai main kar du close? Mail aapke paas aayega aap usko bolo.
Customer: Ah, vaise aap close kar dete hain ma'am kyunki abhi toh koi dikkat nahi hai mere ko aur dikkat hogi toh maine toh aapka number save kar liya tha.
Executive: Okay ma'am, main aap se main ye bol rahi hu ki main abhi aapke conversation ke base pe isko close kar deti hu. Aapke paas mail aayega turant. Please us mail pe aapko revert karna hai ki haan discussion ho gayi hai, yes or no mein.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Okay? Agar woh aap yes kar dogi toh aapke phir phir koi dikkat nahi hogi aur next ko call karna hoga owner ko mera number de dena ya Arpit ka number de dena.
Customer: Theek hai. Aapne Arpit ji ka number toh kya hai?
Executive: Haan toh madam sir ko bhi wahi number de do ki koi bhi concern hai is number pe call karenge ye account manager hai aapke.
Executive: Abhi main concern close kar rahi hu. Mail pe revert jayega aap sirf request hai ki aap usme apna positive response de taaki main us concern ko close kar paun aapka. Theek hai?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Madam aur jo aapne kuch catalog mein correction kari thi abhi tak aapne usme product details nahi dali hai puri. Uska kya status hai madam?
Customer: Actually mein abhi meri bhi sir se theek se baat nahi ho paayi hai na. Kyunki usme mujhe aur bhi kuch change bhi karana hai toh sir se main details le lungi. Uske baad hum main aapse ek baar baat karungi kuch kuch change karani hongi. Toh mujhe ye leni hai. Sure, theek hai, nahi hu na.
Executive: Madam, theek hai, okay, thank you.
[silence]
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan jagma aayi hai.
Executive: Hello.
summary:
Concerns:

- Owner repeatedly raising complaints for video discussion.

- Executive needs to close the complaint ticket.

- Customer has not updated product details in catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive asked customer to discuss with owner.

- Executive will close the ticket based on conversation.

- Customer will revert on the mail with feedback.

- Executive asked customer to share Arpit's number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will take details from sir about catalog.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- complaints, video call, catalog, product details
